questions.question: What is the primary function of providing reinforcement in a rectangular reinforced concrete beam?

answers.a: To increase the compressive strength of the beam
answers.b: To enhance the beam's aesthetic appeal
answers.c: To reduce the weight of the beam
answers.d: To resist tensile forces and improve flexural capacity

questions.question: In a simply Supported rectangular RC beam, where is the maximum moment generally located?

answers.c: At the point of maximum deflection

questions.question: What does the depth of the neutral axis represent in a reinforced concrete beam?
When is shear reinforcement required in a rectangular RC beam?

answers.a: When the beam is excessively deep
answers.b: When shear stress exceeds the capacity of concrete
answers.c: When the beam is subjected to pure axial loads
answers.d: When the beam is long and slender

questions.question: What are the primary failure modes of a rectangular RC beam?
